DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-centre , randomised , single-blind , cross-over study compare BIOFINITY® MULTIFOCAL lens respectively AIR OPTIX® AQUA MULTIFOCAL lens ( lens allocate ratio 1/0.5 ) PUREVISION® MULTIFOCAL lens ( lens allocate ratio 1/0.5 ) , presbyopic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Biofinity Multifocal Compared With Air Optix Aqua Multifocal With PureVision Multifocal
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi-centre , randomised , single-blind , cross-over study compare BIOFINITY® MULTIFOCAL lens respectively AIR OPTIX® AQUA MULTIFOCAL lens ( lens allocate ratio 1/0.5 ) PUREVISION® MULTIFOCAL lens ( lens allocate ratio 1/0.5 ) , presbyopic patient . Each subject 5 visit investigator : - ( V1 ) An inclusion visit first pair lens fit ; - ( V2 ) An optimization visit 7 9 day wear first lens ; - ( V3 ) An evaluation visit additional 10 15 day wear first lens ( 17 24 day ) time second pair lens fit ; - ( V4 , V5 ) Visits conduct V 2 V3 second pair lens .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient , age 18 year old Patients proven presbyopia Patients wear contact lens wore spherical lens include study Myopic patient whose spherical equivalent less equal 9.00 D ( `` lens '' power less equal 8,00 D ) hypermetropic patient whose spherical equivalent le equal +5.50 D ( `` lens '' power less equal +6,00 D ) emmetropic patient distance vision ( plan ) Patient able fill diary without help Patients give informed consent take part study Patients contraindication wear contact lens Patients suffer ocular pathology might interfere evaluation lenses Patients wear multifocal lens spherical lens monovision include study Astigmatic patient whose cylinder 0.75 D
